entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 5:38 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Snow mixed with ice pellets before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
